name: bare-basic-typescript-webpack-three
description: A bare starter example using webpack to package typescript and three (webgl) into a js bundle

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/.bin/webpack && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.watch: ./node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server -dev-server --content-base=./dist --watch  # but doesn't copy html or serve
scripts.devd: devd -ol ./dist  # only server - better to run modd!

author: AJE
